title: Add JSON output support to doc archive command
description:
## Problem

The `jit doc archive` command lacks `--json` flag, making it inconsistent with other commands and preventing proper structured warning output.

## Current State

- All other doc commands (add, list, history, etc.) support `--json`
- Archive command prints directly via `println!` 
- Warnings from `archive_document()` method are currently ignored in main.rs because there's no way to format them properly

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Add `json: bool` parameter to `DocCommands::Archive`
- [ ] Update main.rs to use `OutputContext` for archive warnings
- [ ] Ensure archive success/failure output respects `--json` flag
- [ ] All existing tests pass
